message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know it would be valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $140 to start. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and I'm willing to pay up to $130 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'd like to counter with $130 if possible.
